attributes.action: Get the Manchester Metro link BACK ON TRACK!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
When tony Blair came to Manchester to campaign for his second term in number 10 he promised the people of Manchester that we would get our long needed metro link tram extension. We still do not have this and they have not even started to develop this. Instead Manchester is the be the first place for the congestion charge to be brought in. Basically the government is trying to make money from the traffic problem we have here in Manchester. We do not what the congestion charge. We want to reduce the traffic on our roads, thus making commuting easier and reducing carbon emissions. 

1, get the extension back on track
2, ask the people what they where they would like the metrolink to go
3, show the people the plan
4, get the work started
5, get more trams to cover the new routes
